A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Leftist political subtext throughout this mess. While these films continue to bear the face of Star Wars and our attendant nostalgia continues to draw us to the box office\, their makers have silently gutted the original archetypes and contents and replaced them for quick\, repeated\, extremely transparent swipes at all carriers of a Y-chromosome\, as well as a new meaningless\, incoherent portrayal of The Force\, which shows up when it likes\, means whatever it wants\, and escapes value or even conceptualization. totally trash!
